author: Chris Titus Tech
description:
Stock bash terminal is ugly and missing a LOT of quality of life features. Here is how to fix it to look good and get you around your system faster!

Linux Utility command: curl -fsSL christitus.com/linux | sh

Chapters:
00:00 Intro
00:25 Fonts and Nerd Fonts
03:07 Quick Install Script
04:11 Bash Script Features

Let me know below if there is anything you'd like to see on Linux.
